title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: cross and darning stitches on plain weave foundation with paired warps and paired wefts (basket weave). Counted stitches.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Darning sampler with six darning crosses simulating plain weave, twills and knitting.  Three practice squares and isolated motifs such as crowns, people, and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: cross and darning stitches on plain weave foundation with paired warps and paired wefts (basket weave). Counted stitches.. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-26.
